sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Row, Col, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, CardText, Button } from 'reactstrap'; import image from '../../images/1.png' import { remove } from '../../services/plantsService' import Modal from '../modal/Modal' const PlantCard = ({ plant, plantsData, setPlantsData }) => { const [toggleModal, setToggleModal] = useState(false) const handleRemovePlant = () => { remove(plant.id) .then(removed => removed) .catch(err => console.log("There was an error removing note. Error: ", err)) setPlantsData(plantsData.filter(p => p.id !== plant.id)) } const togglePlantModal = () => { setToggleModal(!toggleModal) } return ( ) } export default PlantCard
